topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5541d7a56368727fe3d53600#post_5541d7a56368727fe3d53600
That's why you shower for one hour.
But what I do is put some water in hand and then pass it throught your hair.
All the microscopic hairs should adhere to your wet hand.

I'VE BEEN PULLING LOOSE HAIRS OUT FOR TWO DAYS
